title: golang 安装
content:
# MAC安装Go

使用go之前的环境配置

### 1.安装Homebrew

请参照Homebrew官网安装: [点击访问Homebrew主页](https://brew.sh/)

### 2.安装Golang

``` bash
$ brew install go
```

### 3.配置GOPATH

``` bash
$ go env
```

``` bash
$ set -gx GOPATH /usr/local/Cellar/go/1.7.6
```

在bash中设置

``` bash
$ vim .bash_profile

    export GOPATH=/usr/local/Cellar/go/1.7.6
    export GOBIN=$GOPATH/bin
    export PATH=$PATH:$GOBIN
```

使修改立刻生效:

``` bash
$ source .bash_profile
```

参考链接: http://www.jianshu.com/p/358cbc939569
